title: Uneasy Commercial Overseer
description: SilkRoadRunner operates numerous commercial properties owned by the Consiglio, creating a strong operational link (StrengthScore: 2735.97) despite significantly low trust (TrustScore: -75.62). This cittadini merchant manages eight of the Consiglio's buildings, including strategic facilities like a Guard Post and Master Builder's Workshop, while the Consiglio maintains concerns about their overall economic stewardship due to vacant properties and inactive contracts that potentially impact the Republic's prosperity.
